XMLDAOFactory - Class in com.hf.fundamental.dao
The XMLDAOFactory class allows to instantiate concrete objects for DAOs in the application.

XMLIdentityController - Class in com.hf.fundamental.controller
The XMLIdentityController links the ApplicationController with IdentityDAO
XMLIdentityDAO - Class in com.hf.fundamental.dao
The XMLIdentityDAO class implements the Identity object CRUD methods for Identity.

XMLUserController - Class in com.hf.fundamental.controller
The XMLUserController class links the ApplicationController with UserDAO
XMLUserDAO - Class in com.hf.fundamental.dao
The XMLUserDAO class implements the User authenticate method for User.
XMLUserDAO() - Constructor for class com.hf.fundamental.dao.XMLUserDAO
When invoked, it is assumed that the file 'users.xml' must have been created and inserted a user with his password.
